Now , cheap domestic dialysate access ESRD patient china , efficacy safety fully clear . And accord research Hongkong , 6000ml dialysate every day able . Thus , presume 3 bag 2500ml Huaren dialysate satisfy everyday need normal Asian . This prospective , randomize , control , multi-center study . Patients treatment group use 2-3 bag 2500ml Huaren dialysate daytime keep 1 bag 2500ml Huaren dialysate night , control group use 3-4 bag normal 2000ml dialysate daytime keep 1 bag 2000ml dialysate night 12 week . After followed-up 12 week , adequacy PD , residual kidney function , peritoneum function QOL patient evaluate .
